name: Dr. Jen Wolkin | Neurodivergent Brain Health

content.html: If you’re beating yourself up for not being productive enough right now, I need to remind you to leave yourself the F alone. Trust your bandwidth in any given moment, and heed it. That’s not weak or lazy. That’s EPIC self-care.
content.value:
If you’re beating yourself up for not being productive enough right now, I need to remind you to leave yourself the F alone. 

Trust your bandwidth in any given moment, and heed it. 

That’s not weak or lazy. 
That’s EPIC self-care.
